definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither

zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither

sentences.english: Finally, he saw a lone sunset palm trees standing.
sentences.chinese: 終於，他看到了夕陽斜暉裏孤零零站着的棕櫚樹。

sentences.english: I was alone in the middle of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 周圍全是海水，只有我孤零零的一個人。

sentences.english: So he halted at a lonely house in which a light was burning.
sentences.chinese: 於是他在一幢點着燈的孤零零的房子前停了下來。

sentences.english: It is stranded somewhat forlornly in the middle of the plain .
sentences.chinese: 它有些孤零零地立在平原中央。

sentences.english: She was really quite alone in the world.
I will not have you left alone so long.
sentences.chinese: 我決不再讓你獨自一個人長期孤零零地生活了。

sentences.english: The old woman stayed in the room lonely with the window and door closed .
sentences.chinese: 那位老婦人關着窗戶和門，一個人孤零零地待在屋裏。

sentences.english: Their lone body, with a beautiful and simple interpretation of the story.
sentences.chinese: 用本身孤零零的身軀，演繹着一個華美而質樸的故事。

sentences.english: It was deserted except for a lone boy seated crosswise on a swing.
sentences.chinese: 裏面沒有別人，只有一個男孩孤零零橫着坐在鞦韆上。

sentences.english: Monody shall not wake the mariner.
sentences.chinese: 孤零零的哀歌將不會喚醒水手。

sentences.english: A lone taxi sits in front of the train station.
sentences.chinese: 一輛出租車孤零零的停在火車站前。

sentences.english: The flower which is single need not envy the thorns that are numerous.
sentences.chinese: 孤零零的小花不必羨慕叢生的荊棘。

sentences.english: But now there were only four nails without the frame.
sentences.chinese: 現在上面卻只剩四顆孤零零的鐵釘。

sentences.english: Or could it be the empty refrigerator that crystallizes a lonely block of cheese?
sentences.chinese: 還是那個裏面只有孤零零一塊奶酪的空蕩蕩的冰箱？

sentences.english: Double-flag is an old solitary castle situated in west hungriness.
sentences.chinese: 雙旗鎮是西部荒漠上一個孤零零的古老堡子。

sentences.english: This well is isolated in the middle of the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 那口井孤零零地在院子中間。

definition: with only body and shadow to comfort each other (idiom)/extremely sad and lonely
to stand for a long time
to tower/standing tall and upright (of large building)
